content: I understand how you feel. Traveling during a pandemic can be nerve-wracking, but it's important to remember that airlines like TAP Air Portugal are taking measures to ensure the safety of their passengers and crew. In addition, there are a few things you can do to keep yourself safe while traveling, such as wearing a mask, washing your hands frequently, and practicing social distancing whenever possible. It's also a good idea to check the entry requirements and restrictions of your destination, as some countries may require a negative COVID-19 test result or quarantine upon arrival. By taking these precautions and staying informed, you can minimize the risk of exposure and enjoy a safe and successful trip.
